section.37: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Abu Burda reported that A'isha brought out for us the lower garment and the upper garment made of the Mulabbada cloth and said:It was in these (clothes) that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) died. Ibn Hatim (one of the narrators) in his narration Wd: The lower garment of coarse cloth
